missionPage.title: Our Mission
missionPage.subtitle: Transforming education through artificial intelligence
missionPage.content: Our mission is to democratize access to quality education, using artificial intelligence to offer personalized feedback and precise academic guidance. We believe that every student deserves to have the best tools to reach their maximum potential.

values.title: Academic Excellence
values.description: We constantly seek continuous improvement of our algorithms to offer the most accurate and useful feedback possible.

values.title: Universal Accessibility
values.description: We develop tools that can be used by everyone, regardless of their limitations or available resources.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We keep our users informed about how our technology works and how we use their data.

visionPage.title: Our Vision
visionPage.subtitle: A future where technology enhances human learning
visionPage.content: We envision a world where artificial intelligence works in harmony with human creativity, creating a personalized and effective learning environment. Our vision is to be the bridge between advanced technology and educational development, making academic success accessible to all.

goals.title: Complete Personalization
goals.description: Develop systems that fully adapt to each student's unique learning style.

goals.title: Global Impact

goals.title: Continuous Innovation
goals.description: Stay at the forefront of educational technology, always exploring new possibilities.

valuesPage.title: Our Values
valuesPage.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make
valuesPage.content: Our values are the foundation of everything we do. They guide our product development, our interactions with users, and our vision for the future. Every feature is created with these principles in mind.

coreValues.title: Real Results
coreValues.description: We focus on creating measurable impact in students' academic lives. Each feature is developed with the goal of generating concrete performance improvements.

coreValues.title: Accessibility
coreValues.description: We believe that quality education should be accessible to everyone. We develop inclusive tools that meet different needs and contexts.

coreValues.title: Constant Innovation
coreValues.description: We are always exploring new technologies and methodologies to improve the educational experience. Innovation is part of our DNA.

coreValues.title: Ethics and Privacy
coreValues.description: We respect our users' privacy and operate with complete transparency about how we use educational data.

coreValues.title: Collaboration
coreValues.description: We value feedback from the educational community and work together with teachers and students to create more effective solutions.

coreValues.title: Technical Excellence
coreValues.description: We develop our tools with the highest technical quality standards, ensuring performance, security, and reliability in all functionalities.
